Real Name: Hisako Ichiki
Special Powers
WE HELP EACH OTHER. THAT'S WHAT WE DO: Defend, Invulnerability, Giant Reach: 2.
EVERYONE GET BEHIND ME!: STOP. When this click is first revealed, after resolutions you may place Armor in a square within 3 squares and line of fire.
ARMOR UP: If Armor is on click #1 and is given an action token, after resolutions you may deal her 1 unavoidable damage.
